data.name: englishKnowledgeDescription
data.value: I've been working in a multicultural environment where English is the main common language for the last 5 years. During my academic period I took summer courses in English every year in UK, Ireland or Malta.

data.name: frenchKnowledgeDescription
data.value: I've been living in France and Belgium for the last 5 years. Moreover, having a French speaking wife, I speak French every day.

data.name: masterAndBachlorDegree
data.value: Master and Bachlor Degree (110/110 cum Laude)

data.name: pesentingSentence
data.value: Hi, I'm a software engineer and I love everything related to software development for web and mobile platforms.

data.name: spanishKnowledgeDescription
data.value: I spent 8 months in Spain attending the University of Extremadura participating to the ERASMUS project. DELE (Diploma de Español como Lengua Extranjera) Certificate awarded in 2009.

data.name: aboutMe_Sentence_1
data.value: Hi, I graduated with a First in Electronic and ICT Engineering from the University of Pavia in Italy in 2009 and I got a High School Diploma in Computer Technology in 2006.

data.name: aboutMe_Sentence_2
data.value: I have a strong background in Information Technology as I carried out various IT projects during my professional experience.

data.name: aboutMe_Sentence_3
data.value: I’ve been working as software developer for 7 years and particularly as web developer for the last 4 years in different European cities.

data.name: masterThesisDescription
data.value: Master thesis on “Processing of Hyperspectral Remote Sensing data” at University of Extremadura, Spain (supervisors Prof. P.Gamba from University of Pavia-Italy and Prof. A.Plaza from University of Extremadura-Spain).

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_1
data.value: During my work experience I have developed various web applications, mainly working with the following technologies: AngularJS, plus obviously Jquery-html5-css3-js, (frontend side) and .Net technologies, such as Web API/Asp MVC - Entity Framework – Microsoft Sql server (backend side).

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_2
data.value: In my first years I also developed Windows applications (mainly C# .Net with WPF), multi-platform applications (C++ Qt framework for Linux), often in the domain of cryptography and security, and I DLLs (C/C++ language) to communicate with external devices through API.

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_3
data.value: I have also developed DLLs (C/C++ language) to communicate with external devices through API. I developed a couple of modules (C language) to embed in a Hardware Security Module in the domain of cryptography for the brand protection market.

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_4
data.value: I enjoy a lot working with Microsoft Visual Studio! It is my favorite IDE. I also developed some project with Qt Creator and Borland/Embarcadero.

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_5a
data.value: I am passionate about my job!

data.name: myExpertise_Sentence_5b
data.value: I constantly train myself, mainly through online courses the evening after the work.

data.name: training_online_1
data.value: I'm continuously training myself, mainly through online courses. I do it very often in the evening after the job.

data.name: training_online_2
data.value: I am a big fun of Microsoft Virtual Academy and I am in the top 100 ranking of my country. That's where I mainly follow the online courses. Other websites I stay tuned with are Udemy and Coursera.

data.name: work_CallistoSpace1
data.value: I’ve worked on a study of feasibility to investigate solutions for building a new ESA (European Space Agency) antennas ground station for future Deep Space missions. In the course of this study I developed two main software.

data.name: work_CallistoSpace2
data.value: One to monitor and control various external devices using TCP/IP, Serial and USB connections (LabVIEW).

data.name: work_CallistoSpace3
data.value: The second is a simulator (C++) to coordinate the delays in antennas signals reception.

data.name: work_CW1
data.value: Development and implementation of software to manage banking activities. I’ve developed mainly in Cobol and SQL and I’ve provided debugging activities of Java programs.

data.name: work_CW2
data.value: I’ve worked on client site (Crediti Agricole bank) as customer support engineer providing solutions for core-banking activities.

data.name: work_STM1
data.value: I’ve been working as developer in the software tool department. I developed tools for internal and external customers, mainly in the domain of cryptography and security.

data.name: work_STM2
data.value: I mainly developed several Windows applications in .Net (c# WPF) and Dlls in C/C++. Some other smaller project I realized involved Delphi, and Python languages and Qt framework.

data.name: work_WebFreelance1
data.value: Being passionate about web development, I decided to develop several web applications as freelance.

data.name: work_WebFreelance2
data.value: I mainly work with Asp .NET MVC, Entity Framework and SQL Server (server side), and HTML5-CSS-Javascript, AngularJS and JQuery (client side).

data.name: cSharpAppDescription1
data.value: I developed applications in different domains. Among the others: cryptography, communication with external devices, chip behaviors simulators, printing applications and test oriented applications.

data.name: cSharpAppDescription2
data.value: For desktop applications I mainly worked with WPF, MVVM pattern, using DevExpress components.

data.name: cSharpAppDescription3
data.value: The installer packages for deployment were created through AdvancedInstaller.

data.name: IronPythonDescription1
data.value: My team and I developed what we called DeviceTesting application. It allows connecting and communicating with several devices connected to the host pc with the goal to test their functionalities. The list of supported communication protocols is broad as well as the type of devices supported, mainly in the field of smartcatds and microchips.

data.name: IronPythonDescription2
data.value: The application is based on WPF, MVVN pattern, taking advantage of DevExpress components. It embeds IronPython to write the scripting tests. The used .NET logging framework is NLog.

data.name: IronPythonDescription3
data.value: AdvancedInstaller is used for package and deployment.

data.name: leclNotesDescription
data.value: LeclNotes is a teacher eBook. It manages the list of classes, courses, students and votes of a teacher in a school calculating the average votes at different moments of the year. It can be easily extended and customized to be introduced in a school where each teacher has his account.

data.name: CandCppProjectsDescription1
data.value: I have developed DLLs (C/C++ language) to communicate with external devices through API. I developed two modules (C language) to embed in a Hardware Security Module (HSM) in the domain of cryptography for the brand protection market.

data.name: CandCppProjectsDescription2
data.value: In the aerospace domain, I developed a tool (C++) to simulate the delays that the different signals can have when received by an array of antennas and their consequences on the Signal-to-noise ratio (S/N).

data.name: CandCppProjectsDescription3
data.value: A key management tool realized in C++ (Qt framework) for Windows and Linux in the domain of PC security and keys storing.

data.name: otherProjectDescription1
data.value: SQL development in the context of a data base migration (Banking domain)

data.name: otherProjectDescription2
data.value: Improvements of test environment written in Delphi to comply with Object Oriented Programming (SmartCard domain)

data.name: otherProjectDescription3
data.value: Other minor applications developed with Delphi (SmartCard domain)

data.name: otherProjectDescription4
data.value: LabVIEW software to monitor and control various external devices using TCP/IP, Serial and USB connections (Aerospace domain)

data.name: otherProjectSentence
data.value: Other projects involving technologies not mentioned before are:

data.name: otherProjectDescription5
data.value: At university I developed a couple of projects using Matlab and Assembler MIPS.

data.name: cryptoPlayerDescription1
data.value: CryptoPlayer is a cryptographic calculator. It allows the user to play with the different cryptographic operations. Symmetric and asymmetric cryptography. Hashing functions. RSA key generation. SSL certificate parsing, validation and creation.

data.name: cryptoPlayerDescription2
data.value: The front end uses AngularJS and Bootstrap, while the backed uses .NET Web API.

data.name: work_Euris1
data.value: I’ve been working as web developer in different projects, mainly in assurance and logistic distribution domain. I've developed web application in form of Single Page Application and we mainly use the following stack:

data.name: work_Euris2
data.value: The IDE I mainly use is Visual Studio. It’s my favorite one! I do daily use (or used in previous projects) various other tool such as automated task-runners, framework to document and test API’s, versioning tool, etc..
